mapper.update:
update user
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
certificate_no = #{certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certificate_no = #{certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
